name: Girls on the Run of the Bay Area
description: Girls on the Run of the Bay Area is empowering today's young girls to become tomorrow's leaders. There are troubling trends in our world; forces that the next generation of young women will have to resist. Female self-confidence begins to drop at age 9, and physical activity declines at age 10. GOTRBA supports girls during this critical time to ensure they are ready and prepared to achieve their goals: at home, at school and ultimately in their careers. We teach girls important skills that they

We teach girls important skills that they
whatTheyOffer: At Girls on the Run they inspire ALL girls to build confidence and make intentional decisions, while fostering care and compassion for self and others. Trained coaches use physical activity and dynamic discussions to build social, emotional and physical skills in every girl while encouraging healthy habits for life.
